topic: Overview of the course, MA1 vs MA2, logic, sets and quantifiers
Sequences of functions, uniform convergence, interchanging limit and integral for uniformly convergent sequences
Series of functions, Weierstrass M-test, power series, radius of convergence,integration of power series, examples
Differentiation of power series, uniqueness of power series coefficients, convergence of Taylor series, applications to differential equations
Exercises on pointwise and uniform convergence, derivative and limit, radius of convergence of power series and applications to differential equations
Open and closed sets in higher-dimensional spaces, limits and continuity of functions, continuity of various operations (sum, scalar multiplication, scalar product, norm)
Continuity of components of vector fields, directional derivatives of scalar fields, partial derivatives, examples, differentiability
Exercises on open sets, domains in higher dimensions, directional derivatives, partial derivatives and gradients
